title: Gears 5 – v1.1.97.0 + 4 DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
Gears 5 – v1.1.97.0 + 4 DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Third-person, 3D
Companies: The Coalition, Xbox Game Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI15
Original Size: 106.6 GB
Repack Size: from 43.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by Gamesdrive, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Gears 5 Hivebusters Network Fix-CODEX

multiup.org

This unlocker will unlock the following store items for use in LAN mode:

> Characters and Skins
> Weapons and Skins
> Banners
> Bloodsprays
> Expressions
> Executions

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Gears.5.Hivebusters-CODEX ISO release: codex-gears.5.hivebusters.iso (114,455,674,880 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.1.97.0; 4 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only when installed with all components)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of the following components: voiceover packs you don’t need (English voiceovers are included by default); useless trash videos files; trailers and non-essential videos; files required for multiplayer modes (LAN or vs bots); Ultra-HD Texture Pack
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 106.6 to 43.5~75.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (campaign only): ~1.5 hours on 8-threads CPU; ~2.5 hours on 4-threads CPU; installing of additional packs will take another 25-50 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 110.1 GB
  • Use “Language Changer.bat” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses compression library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

From one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears is bigger than ever, with five thrilling modes and the deepest campaign yet.

Campaign: The world is crumbling. The Swarm has corrupted the Coalition’s robot army and is descending upon human cities. With danger closing in, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

Versus: May the best team win! Rack up points and trade up for superior weapons in Arcade, a frenetic playlist built for jump-in, over-the-top fun. With ten other game types plus new and classic maps, Versus rewards every competitive style, from casual to pro.

Included DLCs

  • Ultra-HD Texture Pack
  • Pre-Purchase Bonus DLC Content
  • Ultimate Edition DLC Content
  • Hivebusters

You can skip downloading and installing of the following components: voiceover packs you don’t need; useless trash files; files required for multiplayer modes; Ultra-HD Texture Pack. Here’s the list of all optional and selective files:

You can skip downloading and installing of the following components: voiceover packs you don’t need (English is included by default); useless trash files; files required for multiplayer modes; Ultra-HD Texture Pack. Here’s the list of all optional and selective files:

  • fg-optional-brazilian.bin
  • fg-optional-chinese.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-korean.bin
  • fg-optional-mexican.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin
  • fg-optional-multiplayer-files.bin (those files are required if you want to play in Versus mode with bots or on LAN; other MP modes are not working anyway. But I also recommend to download and install this pack just in case some of those files are used during the campaign)
  • fg-optional-ultra-hd-textures.bin (not recommended until you have a power horse with latest gfx accelerator)
  • fg-optional-useless-videos.bin (trash videos, not used by the game)
  • fg-optional-trailers.bin (in-game trailers, “Previously on” and other similar videos)

In example, if you want to launch the game in singleplayer mode only with German UI/Subtitles – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-german.bin & all main files (01-05).

It means you had the bypass version of the game before and it created special credential files on your system, which prevents the crack from working.

To fix it, search for “Credential Manager” in your Windows search bar, open it, navigate to “Generic Credentials” section and delete all creds starting with Xbl*. Most probably, your bypass version will stop working after that, but CODEX crack will work.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous Gears 5 repack.
